meanings.sent1: My grandpas are very kind and tell interesting stories.
meanings.sent2: I visited my grandpas during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: When my grandpas start dancing, it's quite a sight to see!
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my grandpas is a treasure trove of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The old photographs in my grandpas' house tell tales of the past.

meanings.sent1: We celebrated both of our grandpas' birthdays together.
meanings.sent2: The park was filled with families and their grandpas enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent3: My grandpas' favorite hobby is fishing together by the lake.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of our grandpas echoed through the house.
meanings.sent5: The bond between siblings grows stronger with the love of their grandpas.
